item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fishing in City Road Basin, 25th July
item.description:
There is an ongoing issue of fishing along the canal, directly next to clearly posted "No Fishing" signs. Despite the council signage, several individuals are regularly fishing in these areas, with some even setting up tents and appearing to camp there for extended periods. This continued activity is not only in direct violation of the posted rules but also poses a threat to the local wildlife and the overall health of the canal environment. Could the council please take action to address this issue and help ensure the area is respected and properly maintained?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Islington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Offensive odour, 25th July
item.description:
I was cycling yesterday and noticed a strong, offensive odour (somewhat like sewage or rotting meat) in the vicinity of Elmers End Green. There was no visible cause. The smell started on Upper Elmers End road at the junction with Elmerside Road and continued onto Croydon Road heading towards the Tesco superstore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Croydon Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
